prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon that excels in burrowing and has a playful nature.
I want a small creature with big ears and a love for digging tunnels in the earth.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a mole with a cheerful disposition and a brown color scheme.
Make a Pokemon with a round body, large claws, and a knack for finding hidden treasures underground.
Imagine a cute, digging Pokemon with a vibrant personality and a love for sandy habitats.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests and grasslands, showcasing its digging skills.
Give me a playful, ground-type Pokemon with distinctive ear shapes and a small stature.
